content: Example: “Chats in this room are used for discussing project files. Please stay on topic and avoid off-topic conversations or sharing unrelated documents.”

comment.text: This key provides placeholder text for a textarea that displays instructions or guidelines within a dialog box. These instructions inform users about the intended purpose and acceptable behavior within a chat room or agent creation process. Translators should focus on maintaining a clear and concise explanation of the room's/agent's purpose and expected user conduct.
